org.pwr.odwa.client.visualization
Class Visualization

java.lang.Object
  org.pwr.odwa.client.visualization.Visualization
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.gwtext.client.widgets.grid.event.GridCellListener, com.gwtext.client.widgets.menu.event.ColorMenuListener
public class Visualization
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.gwtext.client.widgets.grid.event.GridCellListener, com.gwtext.client.widgets.menu.event.ColorMenuListener

Visualization class is the output of whole ODWA system. It's main purpose is to generate the grid and charts. Methods show() are responsible for displaying these information to user.

onCellContextMenu

public void onCellContextMenu(com.gwtext.client.widgets.grid.GridPanel grid,
                              int rowIndex,
                              int cellIndex,
                              com.gwtext.client.core.EventObject e)
Handles the right-click on the grid menu. Automatically called, created basing on GridCellListener interface. Shows the context menu at the point.

Specified by:
onCellContextMenu in interface com.gwtext.client.widgets.grid.event.GridCellListener
Parameters:
grid - GridPanel in which rightclick occured.
rowIndex - number of row
cellIndex - number of field
e - object on which event occured
See Also:
#show(String title)
